item.title: Template: Featured Image (Vertical)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: This post should display a featured image, if the theme supports it. Non-square images can provide some unique styling issues. This post tests a vertical featured image.
item.content:encoded:
This post should display a featured image, if the theme supports it.

Non-square images can provide some unique styling issues.

This post tests a vertical featured image.

item.title: Template: More Tag
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: This content is before the more tag. Right after this sentence should be a “continue reading” button of some sort on list pages of themes that show full content. It won’t show on single pages or on themes showing excerpts. And this content is after the more tag. (which should be the anchor link for […]
item.content:encoded:
This content is before the more tag.

Right after this sentence should be a “continue reading” button of some sort on list pages of themes that show full content. It won’t show on single pages or on themes showing excerpts.

And this content is after the more tag. (which should be the anchor link for when the button is clicked)

item.title: Template: Excerpt (Defined)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: This is a user-defined post excerpt. It should be displayed in place of the post content in archive-index pages. It can be longer than the automatically generated excerpts, and can have HTML tags.
item.content:encoded: This is the post content. It should be displayed in place of the user-defined excerpt in single-page views.

item.title: Template: Excerpt (Generated)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: This is the post content. It should be displayed in place of the auto-generated excerpt in single-page views. Archive-index pages should display an auto-generated excerpt of this content. Depending on Theme-defined filters, the length of the auto-generated excerpt will vary from Theme-to-Theme. The default length for auto-generated excerpts is 55 words, so to test the […]
item.content:encoded:
This is the post content. It should be displayed in place of the auto-generated excerpt in single-page views. Archive-index pages should display an auto-generated excerpt of this content. Depending on Theme-defined filters, the length of the auto-generated excerpt will vary from Theme-to-Theme. The default length for auto-generated excerpts is 55 words, so to test the excerpt auto-generation, this post must have more than 55 words.

Be sure to test the formatting of the auto-generated excerpt, to ensure that it doesn’t create any layout problems. Also, ensure that any filters applied to the excerpt, such as excerpt_length and excerpt_more, display properly.

item.title: Protected: Template: Password Protected (the password is “enter”)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: There is no excerpt because this is a protected post.
item.content:encoded: This content is password protected. To view it please enter your password below:

item.title: Template: Comments
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: This post tests comments in the following ways. Threaded comments up to 10 levels deep Paginated comments (set Settings > Discussion > Break comments into pages to 5 top level comments per page) Comment markup / formatting Comment images Comment videos Author comments Gravatars and default fallbacks
item.content:encoded:
This post tests comments in the following ways.

  • Threaded comments up to 10 levels deep
  • Paginated comments (set Settings > Discussion > Break comments into pages to 5 top level comments per page)
  • Comment markup / formatting
  • Comment images
  • Comment videos
  • Author comments
  • Gravatars and default fallbacks

item.title: Template: Comments Disabled
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: This post has its comments, pingbacks, and trackbacks disabled. There should be no comment reply form, but should display pingbacks and trackbacks.
item.content:encoded:
This post has its comments, pingbacks, and trackbacks disabled.

There should be no comment reply form, but should display pingbacks and trackbacks.

item.title: Template: Pingbacks And Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: This post has many pingpacks and trackbacks. There are a few ways to list them. Above the comments Below the comments Included within the normal flow of comments
item.content:encoded:
This post has many pingpacks and trackbacks.

There are a few ways to list them.

  1. Above the comments
  2. Below the comments
  3. Included within the normal flow of comments
